![Tetrarkh] of Fairy- refugees To [noeti] [Mimirid]: But you were before the colony of fairies? This is truly splendid place. There so it is miraculous! Entire such beautiful!Both trees and waterfalls, and grass… But at the point of me it was necessary from there to run out… To me is very shameful, indeed I [Tetrarkh] of fairies. [Quest _10305_UnstoppableFutileEfforts 32895-3.htm|To ask about the reason for flight]
